message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. While I understand its value, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is closer to its true value.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to meet you at $12,000. However, I am willing to go up to $11,000 for the product. Would that be acceptable?
